UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Represents a user account within the PRIMELEGAL CONNECT application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

email.description: Email address of the user account.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

isLawyer.description: Indicates whether the user is a lawyer or not.

registrationDate.description: Date and time the user registered.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

specialty.description: The lawyer's primary area of legal practice.

bio.description: A professional biography for the lawyer.

linkedin.description: A link to the lawyer's LinkedIn profile.

dateOfBirth.description: The user's or lawyer's date of birth.

nationalityProofUrl.description: URL to the lawyer's proof of nationality document.

barCouncilNumber.description: The lawyer's Bar Council Registration Number.

licenseUrl.description: URL to the lawyer's license document.

PublicLawyerProfile.title: PublicLawyerProfile
PublicLawyerProfile.description: Publicly visible information for a lawyer, derived from their UserAccount.

userId.description: The UID of the user this profile belongs to.

firstName.description: The first name of the lawyer.

lastName.description: The last name of the lawyer.

photoURL.description: URL of the lawyer's profile picture.

specialty.description: The lawyer's primary area of legal practice.

bio.description: A professional biography for the lawyer.

linkedin.description: A link to the lawyer's LinkedIn profile.

barCouncilNumber.description: The lawyer's Bar Council Registration Number.

Case.title: Case
Case.description: Represents a legal case submitted by a user to a specific lawyer.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents an appointment slot created by a lawyer.

appointmentId.description: A unique ID for the appointment.

lawyerId.description: The UID of the lawyer who created this slot.

dateTime.description: The scheduled date and time of the appointment.

status.description: The current status of the appointment.

bookedBy.description: The UID of the user who booked the appointment.

definition.description: Stores user account information. Only the user themselves can read all fields and write to their own document.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user. This is also the Firebase Authentication UID.

definition.description: Stores public-facing profiles for lawyers. This collection is publicly readable by any user, authenticated or not. Only the lawyer themselves can create or update their own profile.

params.name: lawyerId
params.description: The unique ID for the lawyer profile, which should be the same as the user's UID.

definition.description: Stores case submissions from users to lawyers. Readable by the user who created it and the lawyer it's assigned to. Writable only by the user who created it.

params.name: caseId
params.description: A unique ID for the case submission.

definition.description: Stores appointment slots created by lawyers. Publicly readable. Only the lawyer who created it can write to it. A user can book it by updating the document.

params.name: appointmentId
params.description: A unique ID for the appointment slot.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support user authentication, public lawyer profiles, appointments, and direct case submissions from users to lawyers. The new `cases` collection is a top-level collection to store all case data, secured by rules that ensure only the involved user and lawyer can access it.
